"{0}" is your password. Giving your password out is not allowed! If you are scammed report that user. If your password is the commonly used word, please, change it * New Pop Up Window will open. If it doesn't, just copy-paste the link in your browser A moderator has banned your account. Chobot {0} won't be available anymore Academy Academy Street Accept Accept Accept all incoming messages. Accepted Add a friend After this purchase you’ll have {0} bugs. Continue purchase? Age {0} Agent All of your citizen belongings will stay with you! However, you will not be able to use them until you become a citizen again. Please ask your parents to renew your citizenship status Angry Are you sure you want to remove the selected friends? Asteroid Auto Disconnect, your chobot has been idle over 30 minutes Back Backpack Blushing Bugs Buy Now! Buy the Premium Suit! Buy the ‘Citizen’ status Cafe Cafe Street Can figure it out myself Cancel Change your password Char Window Chat history Check Citizenship expiration simply by clicking on the status button. All of your citizen stuff will stay with you! However, you will not be able to use them until you become a citizen again. Please ask your parents to prolong your citizenship status Check/ Uncheck all Cheerful Choboard Choboard Chobot Chobots Racer Chobots Team Chobots world goes into a full mode. You can use full chat and graffity. Chobots world goes into a safe mode. Text chat and graffity will not be available for couple of hours. You can play games and have fun with friends. Chobots world is in a safe mode at the moment. You are not able to use the text chat and the graffiti. Chollywood Choose your mobile operator and press 'Next' button Choose... Choosing... Chopix Adventure Cinema Citizen Citizens of Chobots world will have permission to: - buy special clothing - upgrade a house - buy pets - play full versions of academy games And this is not all, folks! Become a citizen soon! Citizenship Classroom Click here to start the game Click on an item to add it to the trade list Click on an item to remove it from the trade list Close Coin Rain Color shower Coming soon items! Compose Confirm password Confused Congrats with an awesome item bought! Now you are one of the coolest chobots. Congratulations for becoming citizen. Here is your item of the month! Congratulations! You have got {5} days of ‘Citizen’ status for: {6}. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4} Congratulations! You have got {5} months of ‘Citizen’ status for: {6}. Your status will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4} Connecting... Connection error. You will be redirected to Chobots homepage in a few seconds Continue Country Cow mission Crab Game Cracking up Dance! The more friends you invite, the more extra bugs you will gain! Junior Kick out Laboratory Language Last visit: Chobots news! Loading Location Eco Low quality Magic Shop Magic is ready to use Magic shop for citizens MakeYourOwnHouse Shop Map Masks catalog for citizens Me! Medium quality Menu Message Message from administration# Dear guest, Thanks for visiting Chobots world! Guests can play with other chobots, but if you want to use full chat, receive presents and add friends, you should register. Yours faithfully, the Chobots Team Message has been successfully sent Messages Mission Agency Mission Street Mobile Operator Moderator Money Money you earned: {0} Bugs Money you spent: {1} Bugs Money your invitees earned: {2} Bugs Your bonus: {3} Bugs Music volume Need a Robot? New PayPal Window should open where you can pay with your credit card or PayPal account. If the window is not opened, make sure that your browser doesn't block pop-ups or go back and repeat the procedure New password News Next Nichos kingdom mission No Nothing to trade Now you can check benefits of ‘Citizen’ status. This status will be active within {5} days. It will expire on: {0}-{1}-{2} {3}:{4} Now you have the status ‘Citizen’, that will be active within 12 months. Please ask your parent to buy a premium suit for you Dear parent, to get the suit press 'Next' button Please ask your parent to buy a premium suit for you! Dear parent, to buy the suit, choose your country and follow further instructions Please ask your parents to buy a premium suit for you! Dear parents, to buy the suit, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3}.s Please, enter your message Present Price: {0} bugs Private Chat Put in pack Put on Register Remove Friend Reply Report annoying Report getting personal info Report has been successfully sent Report scam Report spam Report user Report using bad words Report writing personal info Request sent Rest Catalog Robofactory Robot Robot Configurator Robot Weapons Robots Arena Rockemall street Rope Street Russia Sad Scared Secret location. Send to Shocked Shop Shop Square Show Academy tips at startup Show chobots names Show the intro Simply ask your friend to put your chobot’s name on registration page! Sorry, this location is for citizens only. Become a member to be able to enter. Sound volume Space Port Square Space Quay Special Items Stand with your friends on the teleport then press this button to start the game Start! Status Upgrade Coming Soon! Status upgrade! Stuff Catalog Stuff Catalog Suits catalog for citizens Surprised Telescope Text chat is disabled The Best Warriors The PayPal payment system web site will open. After payment is finished, your suit will appear in your wardrobe The Underground The Underground The friend list is full The suit was bought This action is available only for citizens This action is available only for citizens This login isn't available Throw game To all To buy the status ‘Citizen’, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3} To buy the ‘Citizen’ status, choose your country (and mobile operator if necessary) than press Next button To extend your status Citizen for 1 month, you should send the SMS with the following text '{1}' (without inverted commas) to the number {0}. The cost of SMS is {2}{3} To play more games and chat with friends register at {0} To wardrobe Trade Trade completed successfully Trade with USA/Worldwide Ukraine Unignore Unignore user Use Use this Waiting for acceptance... Waiting for the rest of the players Wardrobe Warning from Chobots Support Welcome to Chobots world!# Now, you can play games, dress up and decorate your house. Amazing items are waiting for you in your wardrobe! But, if you want to use full chat, you should activate your account, and choose the proper option. The mail with information how to activate your account has been sent to you. If you haven’t received the mail – try to check your spam-box or to resend the mail. Yours faithfully, the Chobots Team Welcome to {0} Wizard items Wordfall Would you like Chobots to run it faster? Just install the latest flash player by going to {0} Would you like to add this user to your ignore list? Would you like to remove this user from your ignore list? Wrong email address Wrong login Wrong password Yay! You have got an item from Chobots Team for: {0}. Yay! You have grown rich. You get {0} bugs. Yes You are added to {0} ignore list You are obliged to comply with Chobots Behavior Code!!! DO NOT:
  • share or ask for private information use any expressions with sexual or violent content date online on Chobots scam or tease other users with conversation or actions share links unless it is for a Chobots blog spam other users
    • If you break these rules you will be banned or your chat will be disabled You are removed from {0} ignore list You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} hours. "{0}" is a bad word! You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat for {1} minutes. "{0}" is a bad word! You are using bad words! You can't use the full chat from now on. You are using not allowed words! {0} is not allowed word! Sorry, but you can’t buy this. Your chat is currently disabled by chobots moderator. Please, contact support for more information Your chat was disabled by Chobots moderator.
